full_summary:
### Single Axel Plow Truck
#### Government of Canada Tender Announcement
#### Solicitation Number: WS4146391526

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply and delivery of one (1) new model year 2024-2025 Single Axel Plow Truck to Riding Mountain National Park in Manitoba.

#### Key Details
* Solicitation Number: WS4146391526
* Notice Publication Date: November 6, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: December 21, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: October 12, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: September 21, 2024

This tender announcement has a procurement category of Goods and Services (GD) and is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), among other trade agreements. Interested parties are encouraged to review the bid documents and requirements in detail.

#### Contact Information
Questions regarding this RFP should be directed to:
Douglas Rachinski, PSPC/SPAC
douglas.rachinski@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Bid Documents and Requirements
Bid documents and requirements can be accessed through the Ariba Discovery portal (https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17929671?extsite=MTc5Mjk2NzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

#### Notice
Please note that the closing time of the posting on Ariba Discovery has been modified. Bids must be submitted by December 21, 2023, at 1400 EST to be considered. Any submissions received after this time will be declared non-responsive.

#### Contracting Entity

The Contracting Entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) and the end-use entity is Parks Canada Agency (PC). The contact information for the Contracting Entity is as follows:

* Business Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC J8X 0B3, Canada
* Province: Quebec
* Postal Code: K1A 0S5
* Country: Canada
